title: Modal Editing
description: Vim operates in various modes, primarily the normal, insert, and visual modes, allowing for efficient text manipulation and navigation.

title: Extensive Plugin System
description: Vim supports a wide range of plugins, which extend its capabilities far beyond plain text editing.

title: Customization
description: Vim is highly customizable, allowing users to tailor the editor to their specific needs through vimrc configurations and scripts.

title: Powerful Search and Replace
description: Vim offers powerful pattern matching and search-replace capabilities, making text manipulation and refactoring tasks easier.

title: Split Windows
description: Vim allows users to split the window to view and edit multiple files at the same time.

title: Macro Recording and Playback
description: Vim can record and play back keystrokes, allowing users to automate repetitive tasks.

title: Syntax Highlighting
description: Vim supports syntax highlighting for many programming languages, making code easier to read and understand.

title: Code Folding
description: Vim allows users to fold (collapse) sections of code, making large files more manageable.

title: Vimscript
description: Vim features its own scripting language, Vimscript, enabling the creation of complex scripts and workflows.
